name: Policy Analyst
description: We create the content for the tool by analysing and coding major policies. We also research the main institutions involved and their role, and follow the evolution of specific policy plans, to fully understand and show the process behind them. We are now focusing on Spain, Belgium, Cyprus, France and Denmark, but feel free to contact us if you'de like to work on another specific country!
requirements: We would like you to have 3+ hours/week to dedicate to this project.
how_to_apply: Let us know what is your country/region and topic of interest - for now we are focusing on Energy & Climate and Education on the countries mentioned above, but feel free to mention different options.

name: Reviewer & Copywriter
description: It’s not easy to talk about a topic we know so well in a way anyone can understand, leaving all the academic jargon behind. Your mission as a reviewer is to help making our content informal, straightforward and engaging.
requirements: Speak and write fluently in English. Experience in copywriting, writing or reviewing is a bonus. We would like you to have 3+ hours/week to dedicate to this project.

name: Pedagogical content Creator
description: We've got the knowledge, but we need your help to convey it! What is the best way to teach policymaking? How can we design a learning path, or assure that everyone finds useful content in our platform, independently on what they already know (or don't) on policymaking? Help us answer these questions!
requirements: Previous experience in Pedagogy is required. We would like you to have 3+ hours/week to dedicate to this project.

name: UX Designer
description: Help us to effectively create the platform where it all takes place. Design new content for the website, conduct usability tests and improve the existing one.
requirements: Experience in UX Design is required. Experience in User testing, Gamification and/or using Figma are bonuses. We would like you to have 3+ hours/week to dedicate to this project.

name: Gamification Designer
description: How to create an interactive and engaging learning experience? We need your help to gamify our platform, to make learning about policymaking not only easy but enjoyable. Are you up for the challenge?
requirements: Experience in Design with focus on Gamification is required. Experience using Figma is a bonus. We would like you to have 3+ hours/week to dedicate to this project.

name: Full-stack Developer
description: Help us to effectively create the platform where it all takes place. Code and implement new content and maintain the current one.
requirements: Experience with Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL (or other RDMS) and JavaScript is required. Experience with Docker is a bonus. We would like you to have 3+ hours/week to dedicate to this project.
how_to_apply: Share with us your Github profile and/or your portfolio.

name: Social media manager
description: Shape our outreach strategy and develop social media campaigns to update our community on the latest developments and keep it engaged.
requirements: Have basic knowledge of LinkedIn, Instagram and Facebook, which are the social media channels we use. And are willing to learn more through your role! We would like you to have 5+ hours/week to dedicate to this project.

name: Graphic Designer
description: Support our communication team to convey messages in a visual way. Help them by creating graphics for social media and other uses, and ensuring a consistent design in line with our visual identity.
requirements: Know how to create impressive things with Canva, and ideally Adobe Photoshop/InDesign or any other graphic design tools. We would like you to have 3+ hours/week to dedicate to this project.

name: Marketing team
description: Research and identify the right partners, market opportunities and help us identify and develop the unique selling proposition of OpenPolicy Europe. Collaborate with the Partnership Team to identify relevant partners and create a supportive network of expertise.
requirements: We would like you to have 3+ hours/week to dedicate to this project.

name: Community manager
description: As a community manager, you should create the space for people to express themselves and collect ideas. Engage with the community in policy discussions and prepare informal activities, amongst others!
requirements: Social media presence and knowledge of Discord is a bonus. We would like you to have 5+ hours/week to dedicate to this project.

name: Ambassadors Programme team
description: Help fine tuning our ambassadorship programme and looking for potential ambassadors for our tool.
requirements: Knowledge of Discord and participation in other ambassador programmes is a bonus. We would like you to have 3+ hours/week to dedicate to this project.

name: Partnerships team
description: Support us in building long-term partnerships to make OpenPolicy Europe successful. We’re seeking to collaborate with a diverse range of partners, such as think tanks, academia, government institutions or policy advocacy organisations.
requirements: We would like you to have 3+ hours/week to dedicate to this project.
